author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46398#discussion_r1804232273.

#### PR validation:

`unTheMatrix.py -l 330.0 --ibeos` runs fine.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Will be backported to 14.1.X
title: make `{DIGI,RECO}HI2024MIX` steps consume the HIon HLT menu
